#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation,Cloud,GAE,GWT

= Introduction =

 It's a sample GWT project the runs on Google App Engine. The project was generated by eclipse Google plugin.

= Content =

 This is a dummy project with currently contains a simple backend call without database access.

= Development =

== Technology ==

  * weld-1.0.0.SP1 (CDI reference implementation)
  * Mojarra 2.0.1 (JSF 2.0 reference implementation)
  * Hibernate-validator 4.0.0.GA (Bean validation reference implementation)
  * jboss-ejb3 3.1.0 (EJB 3.1 implementation)


== Environment ==

  * Java: jdk 1.6.0_18

== IDE ==

  * eclipse-jee-galileo-SR1-win32
    * Google Plugin for Eclipse 3.5 1.2.0
    * Google App Engine Java SDK 1.3.0
    * Google Web Toolkit SDK 2.0
    * Subclipse 1.6/Subversion 1.6.5


== Deployment ==

 The project is deployed on Google App Engine cloud:
 http://incubator-gwt.appspot.com/
